intro: Stolzia atrorubra, commonly known as the red-flowered stolzia, is a South African plant belonging to the Papaveraceae family. It is characterized by its striking red petals and is typically found in rocky habitats. The plant produces capsule fruits that contain numerous seeds, which are dispersed by wind. It has a short-lived perennial growth habit and is often cultivated for its ornamental value. Stolzia atrorubra is also noted for its medicinal properties in traditional African medicine.
